=== Ubuntu Women Team ===

* Hosted 3 Ubuntu Developer Summit sessions on the Project to flesh out <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Roadmaps/Lucid/UbuntuWomen|Lucid RoadMap]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[https://blueprints.edge.launchpad.net/ubuntu-community/+spec/community-ubuntu-loco-leaderhsip|LoCo Leadership Series]]</nowiki> drafted by Amber Graner handed off to <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Learning|Ubuntu Community Learning Team]]</nowiki> at Ubuntu Developer Summit
* Developed project <nowiki>[[https://blueprints.edge.launchpad.net/ubuntu-women.org/+spec/community-ubuntu-women-project|blueprint]]</nowiki> for Lucid cycle
* Elizabeth Krumbach hosted Ubuntu Open Week session on <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/MeetingLogs/openweekKarmic/WIOS_Issues|Women In Open Source - Issues]]</nowiki> 
* Mackenzie Morgan hosted Ubuntu Open Week session on <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/MeetingLogs/openweekKarmic/WIOS_Encourage|Women in Open Source - Encouragement]]</nowiki>
* Team Meeting on 1 November <nowiki>[[http://wiki.ubuntu-women.org/Meetings/20091101|minutes, log]]</nowiki>
